TEXT.P: The first step is deciding which variable should be on the X-axis. Remember that the independent variable goes on the X-axis and the dependent variable goes on the Y-axis.

Which variable is most likely responding to changes in the other? If stems are responding to changes in hare density, then hare density should be on the X-axis. If hare density is responding to changes in stem density, then stem density should be on the X-axis.
Click on the variable that should be on the X-axis.
